name: CowBoy Gun
description:
FC GunSmoke may not be the hottest shooter, but it is a classic shooting game initially, with the new play of the game to feel the past is our design philosophy.
        Gameplay: Use upper and lower gravity control characters move around, A key to the left to shoot, B key right shot. While pressing A + B, shot to the front. Destroy the enemy, an enemy grenade and bullets carefully!
        I hope you like ~

Email:rxgame@qq.com
